api_root.description: **Testing only:** Change Discord API base path. Only useful for testing, don't use this in production.

application_id.description: Discord Application ID from https://discord.com/developers. Defaults to environment variable `DISCORD_APPLICATION_ID`

bot_token.description: Discord bot token from https://discord.com/developers. Defaults to environment variable `DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN`

client_credentials_token.description: Discord client credentials token. (must have applications.commands.update scope). Defaults to environment variable `DISCORD_CLIENT_TOKEN`

default_permission.description: whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild

name.description: 1-32 lowercase character name. Changing this will force recreation.

type.description: Type of the option, refer to documentation: https://discord.com/developers/docs/interactions/slash-commands#application-command-object-application-command-option-type
Type of the option, refer to documentation: https://discord.com/developers/docs/interactions/slash-commands#application-command-object-application-command-option-type

block.description: Parameters for the command. Note: As an implementation detail, making a subcommand group is supported, but only exactly one nesting down of subcommands.
Parameters for the command. Note: As an implementation detail, making a subcommand group is supported, but only exactly one nesting down of subcommands.
